item.title: Mega the naughty girl
item.description: Mega is a daughter of Mini and Nano. She is a very naughty girl. Her birth day is 3 December 2014. She is a social girl and full of energy. She loves to play with people. Moreover, she eats like a monster.

item.title: Mini the cute boy
item.description: Mini is a pomeranian dog. He is a very playful boy. His birth day is 4 April 2013. His eye is full of inspiration and loved. When I walk to any where, he always walks follow me even to toilet. He is my real little angel boy.

item.title: Nano the sweet girl
item.description: Nano is a hybrid of poodle and chihuahua. She is a sweet girl. Her birth day is 24 December 2013. She is a powerful dog. When she wants something, nothing can stop her. However, she is very kind to people. She loves to sleep on my lap. When she looks at me, my world is brighter. She is so sweet.
